comment: Does not communicate well. I have sent many emails with no response from her. Lots of work, but there is no sense of instruction or guidance in the course. You can learn it yourself using the textbook, but it is very detailed with lots of statistics and studies. Assignments and rubrics aren't always clear. Weird, hard course.

I took the online class for victimology and the amount of work is insane. the normal weekly work includes a paper (1-2 pages), 3 posts discussion for full credit, and at the end of the semester a 15 hour assignment with yet another 3-4 page paper. Don't expect feedback past her sending a rubric with check marks.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Dr. Emerson is a really sweet lady but her expectations are definitely up there. Each week we had a two page reflection paper due on top of a discussion post. For the discussion post she had a requirement that you post two days before the due date which I personally hated. Her tests are 4 hours long with 30 T/F, 20 bill in the blank, and 10 essays.

She is really good professor. Took her online and the amount of work she gives per week is very reasonable. Whenever I had a question or was unclear  about  something, she got back to me by the end of that day

Dr. Emerson is highly educated and she is the best CJ professor for CJ major. Very easy going and professional. It is college people so you have tot study and do some work. But she is really cook if you need her just e-mail her

Best CJ and SOCI prof at KSU. CJ majors will have a lot of fun with her because she is really laid back. I took her online classes and it was really good. You just have to keep with it and do the assignments. I am taking all my SOCI and CJ classes with her.

I took it as an online class-- Really easy class, but if you have a question/comment/concern, look forward to waiting for 3 months, if not longer for her to respond! She's terrible at responding to questions! Otherwise, its a simple class. Quizzes, debates, assignments every week; 4 tests, but she drops the lowest. Also a court observation paper.

Easy class! It was an all online class. Just do all the assignments in one day and have the rest of the week off! There are debates you have to do in a chat room.. they arent too bad just research your topic before your debate and you will be fine. There is also a courtroom paper. You have to sit in on a hearing.
Great professor.  Alot of work in this class, but it is not hard, just tedious.  Tests are only essay, but she gives detailed study guides.  Would recommend.
She is really nice, and the best part of the class is that you only have to go once a week!
Very easy class. Half online and half classroom. Every thing comes directly from the book. If you have a choice, take her, she's great.

I took the hybrid online class where we only met once a week and the rest we did on webct.  Extremely easy because everything came right from the book.  The tests were just the same questions from the quizzes we had to take online.  Also, she was very nice and laid back.
